featured.text: When wholesome laughter fills the air, Some ills will soon depart;
C. Cathy Zoos are a tradition, and a visit to a zoo is a wholesome family activity.
you want to give your family a nice, wholesome vacation, try visiting this charming town.

definition.zh_def: 有益健康的；有益身心的
definition.en_def: Conducive to health or well-being; promoting moral or ethical goodness.
definition.example: She enjoys watching wholesome movies that uplift her spirits.
